title: Print, "Instructions for Holding the Pen for Italic Script, incunabulum page", ca. 1616
medium: Pen and black ink over graphite on white laid paper

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Instructions for Holding the Pen for Italic Script, incunabulum page", ca. 1616.
ca. 1616. Pen and black ink over graphite on white laid paper. Gift of William J. Donald. 1954-18-26.
